entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Walkerton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:02 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming east 20 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
